    Latest Research

    Machining thin metallic foils

    Machining thin metallic foils by applying electric current pulse and a mechanical stress: synergy between variuos fields. Detailed description coming soon.

    High throughput creep

    High throughput determination of creep response of materials, saving time and resources by more than 10 times. Detailed description coming soon.

    Visualisation of stem cells

    Visualisation of stem cells. Detailed description coming soon.

    Inverse Blech Length

    Discovery of Inverse Blech Length in presence of thermomigration and electromigration in thin films. Detailed description coming soon.

    Atoms resolved by APT in 100 cubic planes

    Atoms resolved by APT in 100 cubic planes. Detailed description coming soon.

    Microstructure of additively manufactured stainless steel

    Microstructure of additively manufactured 316L stainless steel subjected to tensile loading. Detailed description coming soon.

    Micrographs of additively manufactured Ti-6Al-4V

    EBSD micrographs of additively manufactured Ti-6Al-4V after heat treatment. Detailed description coming soon.
